title: Boots On The Ground
lyrics:
Oh-oh, woah, oh, woah
I got my boots on the ground (Boots on the ground)
Yeah (Where them fans at?)
Oh-oh, woah, oh, woah
I got my boots on the ground (Boots on the ground)
Where the fans at? (Wherе them fans at?)

Get up out your seat (Your sеat)
Let your body move (Move)
Cowboys and Cowgirls, they feelin' that groove
Sippin’ on Moonshine, fire-barrel rollin'
I’ma get behind that thing, girl
Then hold it, hold it, hold it, hold it

Woah, oh, woah, oh, woah
Got my boots on the ground (Boots on the ground)
Yes, sir (Where them fans at?)
Lord, have mercy
Oh-oh-oh, oh-oh
Oh, got my boots on the ground (Boots on the ground)
Fans, please (Where them fans at?)

Heh, I hope you got good knees
'Cause we gonna giddy up, uh
Everybody’s dancing to that juke joint love
Hold on to your wig, hold on to your man
'Cause the Steppers in the building, y'all
And they throwin' them fans (C'mon)

Woah, oh, woah, oh, woah
Got my boots on the ground (Boots on the ground)
Yeah (Where them fans at?)
Huh
Oh-oh, woah, oh, woah
Got my boots on the ground, baby (Boots on the ground)
Huh, wait a minute (Where them fans at?)

Boots on the ground, kickin' up some dust (Kickin' up that dust)
Boots on the ground, kickin' up some dust
Wait a minute now, where them fans at?
Where them fans at? Where them fans at?
Hit me one time, hit me two time

Oh, oh, woah, oh, woah
I got my boots on the ground (Boots on the ground)
Yeah, yeah (Where them fans at?)
Oh, oh, woah, oh, woah
I got my boots on the ground (Boots on the ground)
Wait a minute, let me do that one more time
For the ones who ain’t hear me, listen

Boots on the ground, kickin' up some dust
Boots on the ground, kickin' up some dust
Wait a minute now, where them fans at?
Where them fans at? Where them fans at?
Hit me one time, hit me two time

Woah, oh, woah, oh, woah
I got my boots on the ground (Boots on the ground)
Ho—oh, yeah (Where them fans at?)
Woah, oh, woah, oh, woah
Got my boots on the ground, baby (Boots on the ground)
Y'all know I don't mind (Where them fans at?)

Boots on the ground (Boots on the ground)
Where them fans at? (Where they at?)
Boots on the ground
Where them fans at? (Where them fans at)
Where them fans at?
Where them fans at?
Oh
